content: an alternative to the original resistance hat this one has a longer top we like using a worsted weight yarn and knitting at 5 5 sts to 1 to get a nice warm hat you can also use a dk weight yarn to make it even warmer double the ribbing and fold it up for two layers over your ears 220 yards of worsted weight is enough to make one hat including the icord and tassle or pom pom we knit it on size 5 circular 16 needles and double points or magic loop for the top decreasing we are providing this pattern for free so it is available to everyone if you can afford to donate to an organization to help melt the ice there are many organizations that would benefit i like standwithminnesota com
